title: SATURATED: Erotic Novella
description: Tanya & Rochelle's new relationship gets hotter and hotter as they think up inventive ways to experience fresh sexual thrills. They join with their friend Charlene, make a new friend in Marty, and go to any lengths to reach maximum satisfaction in their zany experimental adventures. In the garden at midnight, or in a shop on view to the public, their energy levels increase in order to create the ultimate orgasm.
author: Millicent Dringhouses
